meanings.sent1: The interfamilial picnic brought together neighbors from different families.
meanings.sent2: The interfamilial gathering included cousins from various households.
meanings.sent3: The interfamilial potluck turned into a friendly competition of family recipes.
meanings.sent4: The interfamilial bond between the two clans was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The interfamilial relationships in the community made it feel like one big family.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving relationships between different families.
meanings.sent1: The interfamilial wedding united two families in celebration.
meanings.sent2: The interfamilial conflicts arose due to misunderstandings between households.
meanings.sent3: The interfamilial rivalry over the best holiday decorations was all in good fun.
meanings.sent4: The interfamilial connections formed at the neighborhood block party were unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The interfamilial dynamics at the family reunion were filled with laughter and joy.
